Four astronauts, including Turkey's first, arrive at space stationA four-man crew including Turkey's first astronaut arrived at the International Space Station (ISS) early on Saturday for a two-week stay in the latest such mission arranged entirely at commercial expense by Texas-based startup company Axiom Space. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 11:22:17 GMT R3VUIOS2ZNPCTPWZC5Y6ITT5NI https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/four-astronauts-include-turkeys-first-arrive-space-station-2024-01-20/Steve Gorman技术空间
Exclusive: Iranian and Hezbollah commanders help direct Houthi attacks in Yemen, sources sayTehran has provided advanced drones, anti-ship cruise missiles, precision-strike ballistic missiles and medium-range missiles to the Houthis, who are targeting commercial vessels in solidarity with Palestinians in Gaza, the sources said. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 11:17:48 GMT DAEISOBJYZNJBNOARZ5WYADGLY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iranian-hezbollah-commanders-help-direct-houthi-attacks-yemen-sources-say-2024-01-20/Samia Nakhoul, Parisa Hafezi世界中东
Indonesia's Prabowo strengthens lead in election pollsIndonesia's presidential candidate frontrunner Prabowo Subianto widened his lead over his opponents in the latest surveys as the world's third-largest democracy heads to an election on Feb. 14, two pollsters said on Saturday. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 11:11:02 GMT EFALQXMIZBM3RBS7DOP7LU7IHU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-prabowo-strengthens-lead-election-polls-2024-01-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
Fighting across Gaza as Israel drops leaflets seeking its hostagesIsrael pounded targets across the Gaza Strip on Saturday while its planes dropped leaflets on the southern area of Rafah urging Palestinians seeking refuge there to help locate hostages held by Hamas, residents said. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 11:05:20 GMT MJWLG5C3RJPZRB3PUKVLPO2YUE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/fighting-across-gaza-israel-drops-leaflets-seeking-its-hostages-2024-01-20/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Fadi Shana世界中东
Iran successfully launches Sorayya satellite - Iranian mediaIran has successfully launched its Sorayya satellite into orbit, Iranian state media reported on Saturday. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 08:53:44 GMT CWBDJPHT4NJ63ESIYFJBWZDEPE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-successively-launches-sorayya-satellite-iranian-media-2024-01-20/Reuters世界中东
Israeli strike on Damascus kills four Iranian Revolutionary GuardsAn Israeli missile strike on Syria's capital Damascus on Saturday killed four members of Iran's Revolutionary Guards, including the head of the force's information unit in Syria, a security source in the regional pro-Syria alliance told Reuters. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 08:42:14 GMT P67MKLSNU5OUVGSGRGHCFSU6UU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-strike-damascus-kills-iranian-guards-official-source-regional-pro-syria-2024-01-20/Laila Bassam, Kinda Makieh世界中东
Russia to consider law on property confiscation for 'fakes' about armyRussian lawmakers have prepared a bill allowing for the confiscation of money and property from people who spread "deliberately false information" about the country's armed forces, a senior member of parliament said on Saturday. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 08:08:56 GMT YPW2VUEAXBLOHKBYT6OQT4FE7U https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-consider-law-property-confiscation-fakes-about-army-2024-01-20/Reuters世界
Syrian state media report likely Israeli attack on residential building in DamascusSyrian state media said a likely Israeli attack had targeted a building in the Mazzeh neighbourhood of Damascus on Saturday, without giving further details. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 08:07:47 GMT DOWBH64COFPRNKPPKX5YLALYCY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/syrian-state-media-report-likely-israeli-attack-residential-building-damascus-2024-01-20/Reuters世界中东
New mosque construction in India's Ayodhya to begin in May, Muslim group saysAs Hindu devotees prepare to inaugurate a grand temple to one of their holiest deities, India's minority Muslims plan to begin building a new mosque in the same city later this year, hoping to make a fresh start after a bloody, decades-long dispute. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 05:41:58 GMT RBUUKQ7EDBMKFJ3ABWXXQIT2LA https://www.reuters.com/world/india/new-mosque-construction-indias-ayodhya-begin-may-muslim-group-says-2024-01-20/Shivam Patel世界印度
Several hundred Honduran migrants prepare to travel north - local mediaSeveral hundred migrants have gathered at a bus terminal in northern Honduras in preparation to head towards the United States, local television reported on Friday, seeking to flee poverty and a lack of jobs in the Central American nation. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 04:25:14 GMT PPTRBDFOAZMUXELDS6YG5J2QIU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/several-hundred-honduran-migrants-prepare-travel-north-local-media-2024-01-20/Reuters世界美洲
Thousands of New Zealand Maori meet to discuss response to government plansMore than 10,000 New Zealand Maori congregated in the central North Island on Saturday to discuss how to respond to government plans that are seen by many Indigenous groups as undermining their rights and status. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 04:19:48 GMT TGCMDXEBRNOMZJZ3HYLQLC65NU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thousands-new-zealand-maori-meet-discuss-response-government-plans-2024-01-20/Lucy Craymer世界亚太地区
